arts.ttl: Everton vs Accrington Stanley - Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: The Blues will kick off their pre-season with a friendly against League Two side Accrington Stanley.

arts.ttl: Match Preview: Accrington Stanley v Everton
arts.sum: The first few matches in pre-season are as meaningless as it gets in first-team professional football, with coaches and managers juggling to make up sufficient numbers as the senior players return in dribs and drabs, with varying levels of fitness.
